column5: Does anyone out there have any recommendations for a fall fishing (lake trout & walleye) & grouse hunting? We are looking for a new place to go & prefer housekeeping. We are looking at the last two weeks in Sept. Any help would be greatly appreciated.
Try Sharpe's cliff lake lodge good trout and alot of grouse.
Do you have a website address for cliff lake?
May I suggest you look at www.sawmill-lodge.com or call them toll free at 1-866-264-5464
There are a lot places listed on http://www.justfishontario.comTry their Trip Finder feature and you will get just what you are looking for. I did.

I used own Cliff lake lodge I now own Five lakes lodge on Gullrock Cliff lake has alot of 6-12 lb. trout it's the best area for grouse, along hwy. 105 and ord lake about an hour down a logging road is excellent for Sept. walleye fishing. let me know if you book there and I'll tell you where to go.
